review_title: Think thoroughly, weigh pros and cons before joining
pros: work life balance, flexibility of  work timin, WFH
cons:
irresponsible and indecisive management, no standard process, back and forth by management for simple solutions that causes delay,  Arrogant CF
O, peanuts for payment, Management roadblocks , delays in approvals, shifting blames, unclear leaders, tardy programs, sub mediocre content, program leaders working as sales people to get more numbers instead of quality, 0 or minimalist impact on stakeholders, attrition of stakeholders, management blame employees for their incapabilities, running on "jugaad" technology, doesn't value employees or their opinions, frequent changes in program operation, documents etc, high attrition cause of perpetual nonclarity.

review_title: Entrepreneurial and dynamic environment, with lots of growth opportunities.
pros: If you want to make a difference in emerging economies, work at a large scale, and be able to own and drive your programs with a high degree of independence, this is a great place.
cons: Can be very demanding, and occasionally lack support. If you need lots of feedback and "hand-holding" to get things done, this is not the place for you.

pros: The passion people bring in here is incomparable. Good people, with the hearts and minds in the right place doing a lot to transform lives. With primary focus on job creation in emerging economies. Not only the goals here are bigger than most Govt's but the 'walk the talk' is heartening.
cons: No cons. Just that, continuing to get the 'right' people with the drive, passion and the knowledge the Founders/Leadership team brings in may not be easy.

review_title: Great opportunities, strong  vision, ambitious plans
pros: There are a lot of opportunities that can be leveraged. The co-funding needs make things a bit more sustainable in the long term
cons: It can be slow, but the long term vision is good. There is a lot of pressure to do more with less. Which may lead to understaffing. The team is good though

pros: Every day is a great learning , innovation is a part of life here . Have freedom to build and implement solutions  that really impact life of youth . Opportunity to set benchmark .  High level of self-satisfaction .
cons: nothing such to mention as of now
